attributes.title: CS:GO Heist Co-Op Adventures Mod w/ Chilled Chaos!
attributes.caption: "Which button makes love?"
attributes.description:
Thanks to ExpressVPN for sponsoring our channel http://expressvpn.com/funhaus

On the set of The Rock, a PA laid a line of coke across the entire length of the island. Bruckheimer and Bay started snorting from either side. They met in the middle, their noses touching oh so gently. The truth of their feelings could no longer be denied. And that, little children, is how Pearl Harbors are made.

attributes.title: Hopelessly LOST in Garry's Mod - Co-Op Adventures w/ Kahlief Adams
attributes.caption: "There's always a hole!"
attributes.description:
Thanks to ExpressVPN for sponsoring our channel http://expressvpn.com/funhaus

CALIFORNIA MECHANICAL CODE CH. 6 - DUCT SYSTEMS
602.6 Factory-Made Air Ducts
Factory-made air ducts shall be approved for the use intended or shall be in accordance with the requirements of UL 181. Materials exposed within ducts or plenums shall be noncombustible where tested as a composite product in accordance with ASTM E84 or UL 723, and must hold the weight of no less than two(2) smart-mouthed down-on-their-luck cops who play by their own rules.
